params.about_text: Senior Engineer at Apexon | React JS | Next JS | Redux | JavaScript & Typescript | Formik | Sentry | Jest & Enzyme | Keyclock | Docker | Git & Bitbucket | Jenkins | AWS | Azure | CICD | Google Analytics. I'm a React JS developer with 4 years of experience looking to create usable, useful, and well-designed websites and applications using React JS, Next JS, Redux, Jest, and Git. I'm looking forward to continuing to learn and collaborate with wonderful people.
